title: RITO PLS ------ Owner of site has banned my ip (106.42.3123.113 --- Fake ip btw)
body: Periodically, when i try to get onto league of legends .com it says the owner of my site has banned my ip address. Even though I didnt do anything. Is there any fix to this I have already changed my IP Address but my ip changes back to the originally banned one. Riot pls

replies.body: Hmmmm that's pretty odd. I can say for now that it doesn't look like we would have IP banned you for any reason. Since this will involve some of your personal information, it'd be best to handle this in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Take a screenshot of the exact error and attach it to your ticket as well so we know exactly what we're dealing with!

Okay I dont have a screenshot of it now. But if it happens again I cant send a ticket to get on league website.
But ill figure it out

You should be able to send us a ticket if you follow that link. If it's not working, I want to try to help with that too so that we can help you get this IP thing figured out. Is the ticket page giving you any kind of error, or why won't it let you submit a ticket?
I understood what you meant. But I just dont have a screenshot of the error. It hasnt done it yet. So hopefully we are okay now. Havent had the error for a couple of days.
